# quote

Display quote stats for a stock, 52 week high/low, market cap/float, and 200/50 day MA

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/quote ticker
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/quote AMD
```
---
